mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_user (account, password, nickname, avatar, sex, birthday, email, phone) VALUES (#{account}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT id,nickname,email FROM shop_user WHERE email = #{email}
select count(email) from shop_user WHERE email = #{email}
select count(account) from shop_user WHERE account = #{account}
